about_the_game:
This visual novel is the last in the Welcome To... Chichester 2 trilogy, and the penultimate episode overall. Playing the previous episode would be beneficial.



For a short while after the events of No Regrets For The Future, life returned to normality for the protagonist and Grendel Jinx. However, with William making an unwanted return from the Happy Glowstick Funtime Re-education Camp, everything starts becoming more complicated for Grendel as she has to contend with final school exams, her parents divorcing, and an unwanted new stepsister.

The protagonist is naturally dragged into these affairs as he/she has to contend with an assassination attempt by Grendel's father, being abducted by Grendel's mother, an increasingly hostile (to The Council Of The Unseen) secretary and a debauched boss, culminating in the protagonist being forced to destroy The Council Of The Unseen, by using their own weapons against them.

Spanning five years from the end of No Regrets to the start of The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation, this episode concludes the main prequel arc - with a bang



  • 11 bad endings and one true ending
  • Multiple routes
  • 100,000+ word story, with an estimated play time of 6 - 8 hours. Complete the game, and subsequent playthroughs will extend the story by around 2 to 3 hours, with extra detail for certain events.
  • Option to display current route (and choice)
  • Visual impairment modes as well (font change, font size and so on)

content_descriptors.notes:
Off and on-screen violence
Homicide
Implied sexual assault
Sexual innuendo
Violence involving frying pans (not to be tried at home)

detailed_description:
This visual novel is the last in the Welcome To... Chichester 2 trilogy, and the penultimate episode overall. Playing the previous episode would be beneficial.



For a short while after the events of No Regrets For The Future, life returned to normality for the protagonist and Grendel Jinx. However, with William making an unwanted return from the Happy Glowstick Funtime Re-education Camp, everything starts becoming more complicated for Grendel as she has to contend with final school exams, her parents divorcing, and an unwanted new stepsister.

The protagonist is naturally dragged into these affairs as he/she has to contend with an assassination attempt by Grendel's father, being abducted by Grendel's mother, an increasingly hostile (to The Council Of The Unseen) secretary and a debauched boss, culminating in the protagonist being forced to destroy The Council Of The Unseen, by using their own weapons against them.

Spanning five years from the end of No Regrets to the start of The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation, this episode concludes the main prequel arc - with a bang



  • 11 bad endings and one true ending
  • Multiple routes
  • 100,000+ word story, with an estimated play time of 6 - 8 hours. Complete the game, and subsequent playthroughs will extend the story by around 2 to 3 hours, with extra detail for certain events.
  • Option to display current route (and choice)
  • Visual impairment modes as well (font change, font size and so on)
legal_notice:
Background graphics by Mustikadewia
Character graphics by Larvinlucas

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Lastest version of Ubuntu/Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or later
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part III : NightFall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 upwards
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX compatible
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX compatible
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

short_description: Spanning five years, this episode concludes the prequel arc, and focuses more on Grendel Jinx and her dysfunctional family, whilst 'The Council Of The Unseen' slowly unravels
